item.title: danielle add a quote by Rachel Cohn
item.description: "It's bullshit to think of friendship and romance as being different. They're not. They're just variations of the same love. Variations of the same desire to be close." -- Rachel Cohn

item.title: danielle add a quote by Walter Dean Myers
item.description: "Cutting people out of your life is easy, keeping them in is hard." -- Walter Dean Myers

item.title: danielle add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Love is the strongest emotion any creature can feel except for hate, but hate can't hurt you. Love, and trust, and friendship, and all the other emotions humans value so much, are the only emotions that can bring pain. Only love can break a heart into so many pieces. " -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: danielle add a quote by Bernard Meltzer
item.description: "A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked." -- Bernard Meltzer

item.title: danielle add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description:
"You may not remember the time you let me go first. Or the time you dropped back to tell me it wasn't that far to go. Or the time you waited at the crossroads for me to catch up. You may not remember any of those, but I do and this is what I have to say to you:
Today, no matter what it takes, we ride home together." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: danielle add a quote by Stephen Schwartz
item.description: "I've heard it said that people come into our lives for a reason Bringing something we must learn And we are led to those who help us most to grow If we let them and we help them in return." -- Stephen Schwartz

item.title: danielle add a quote by Waqar Ahmed
item.description: "Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks" -- Waqar Ahmed

item.title: danielle add a quote by Stieg Larsson
item.description: "Friendship- my definition- is built on two things. Respect and trust. Both elements have to be there. And it has to be mutual. You can have respect for someone, but if you don't have trust, the friendship will crumble." -- Stieg Larsson

item.title: danielle add a quote by Emily Giffin
item.description: "When you are in a relationship, you are aware that it might end. You might grow apart, find someone else, simply fall out of love. But a friendship isn't a zero-sum game, and as such, you assume that it will last forever, especially an old friendship. You take its permanence for grandted, whuch might be the very thing so dear about it." -- Emily Giffin

item.title: danielle add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Don't you think it's better to be extremely happy for a short while, even if you lose it, than to be just okay for your whole life?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: danielle add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Only love of a good woman will make a man question every choice, every action. Only love makes a warrior hesitate for fear that his lady will find him cruel. Only love makes a man both the best he will ever be, and the weakest. Sometimes all in the same moment. -Wicked " -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: danielle add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: danielle add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: danielle add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for." -- Bob Marley

item.title: danielle add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: danielle add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: danielle add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies." -- Aristotle

item.title: danielle add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: danielle add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Never leave a friend behind. Friends are all we have to get us through this life--and they are the only things from this world that we could hope to see in the next." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: danielle add a quote by Emilie Autumn
item.description: "It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill." -- Emilie Autumn

item.title: danielle add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "When a girl says she wants to be friends with benefits, I always ask if that includes dental insurance." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: danielle add a quote by Marc Wambolt
item.description: "I may not always be with you But when we're far apart Remember you will be with me Right inside my heart" -- Marc Wambolt

item.title: danielle add a quote by Frances Ward Weller
item.description: "A friend can tell you things you don't want to tell yourself" -- Frances Ward Weller

item.title: danielle add a quote by Walter Winchell
item.description: "A friend is one who walks in when others walk out." -- Walter Winchell

item.title: danielle add a quote by Laura Fraser
item.description: "It isn't such a bad thing to always know that someone on the other side of the world cares about you." -- Laura Fraser

item.title: danielle add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "I guess that's what saying good-bye is always like--like jumping off an edge. The worst part is making the choice to do it. Once you're in the air, there's nothing you can do but let go." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: danielle add a quote by Bernard Meltzer
item.description: "There is no better exercise for your heart than reaching down and helping to lift someone up" -- Bernard Meltzer

item.title: danielle add a quote by Julie James
item.description: "Just because we haven’t met Mr. Right doesn’t mean we’re doing anything wrong. And by the way, you’re brilliant and awesome, too. If I were a lesbian, I’d totally settle down with you and make lots of in vitro babies." -- Julie James

item.title: danielle add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "I mean that everything this afternoon has been too beautiful, and that perhaps everything together will never be so right again. I'm very glad therefore you've been a part of it." -- Henry James

item.title: danielle add a quote by Irene S. Levine
item.description: "Your best friend is the person who not only knows all the important stories and events in your life, but has lived through them with you. Your best friend isn't the person you call when you are in jail; mostly likely, she is sitting in the cell beside you." -- Irene S. Levine
